title: Wear Rotary Calculator
summary: Redefining one of the most iconic devices of our time; the Wrist Calculator.
developerAddress:
Aeus Tech, Inc.
2nd Floor, Emmanuel Business Center,
Sen. Benigno Aquino Avenue, Diversion Road., Iloilo City
description: Designed exclusively for Android Wear, Wear Rotary Calculator takes a bold new step in bringing a time-tested utility app into the 21st century, all on the comfort of your own wrist.- Beautifully redesigned interface- Tap Center to bring up Basic Operations- Press "Mode Toggle button" to use Advanced Mode (In-App Purchase)- Swipe Up to switch between Radian and Degree Mode- Swipe Right to ExitCOMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higherDesigned / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc.Say hello at: info@aeustech.com
descriptionHTML:
Designed exclusively for Android Wear, Wear Rotary Calculator takes a bold new step in bringing a time-tested utility app into the 21st century, all on the comfort of your own wrist.


- Beautifully redesigned interface
- Tap Center to bring up Basic Operations
- Press "Mode Toggle button" to use Advanced Mode (In-App Purchase)
- Swipe Up to switch between Radian and Degree Mode
- Swipe Right to Exit


COMPATIBLE ANDROID WEAR DEVICES:
Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch and/or Moto 360 running Android 4.3 or higher


Designed / Developed by AEUS TECH Inc.
Say hello at: info@aeustech.com
comments: Useless Doesn't display any information. Location just says "city" and temperature is 00° and it's always fog. You have to pay to get to settings, but there isn't any options really, so why bother? It's does look good though.
Display cut off This looked awesome until I tried it on Moto 360 2nd gen. The display is cut off and is not nearly as elegant as the promo images. Maybe I'll try it again in the future. Uninstalled.
Amazing app Love it, helps me a ton in geometry. Great interface :p
It doesn't actually do rotary motion Lame
Meh You need to pay for anything beyond basic functions. No thanks
Sorry, fails simple calculation First test I do on any calculator app is 16÷3*3, should be 16, this calculator gives 15.99 - fail! Android calculator gets it right.
